children.html:
Wikihow is a site of community-edited tutorials, and has a lot of funny articles which give generic advice 
        similar to other self-help or self-branding discourse. This article "How to be mysterious", explains how to 
        build reputation through being mysterious, looking unique, complex and attractive.

A little bit of mystery can go a long way when building your reputation. 
        By adjusting how you talk and act in public, you can wrap yourself in an air of 
        secrecy that will make you seem more interesting, exciting, and attractive to the people around you.

Embrace your uniqueness. Those who are mysterious often march to the beat of their own drum, 
        meaning they don’t just follow the crowd. Instead of wearing trendy clothes and participating in popular activities, 
        rock your own style and embrace all things odd. This may make you appear complex and even difficult to understand to others.
